segments.text: Hello , Mr.Green . This is Lin Tong . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Mr.Lin . I am leaving tomorrow and I am just packing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry to interrupt you . But I am calling to say goodbye to you . I am awfully sorry to tell you that I am afraid I could not see you off at the airport tomorrow , because I will have to attend a very important meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter , Mr.Lin . I can understand . I know you are always very busy . Work must come first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . You have been here for almost three weeks . How time flies !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And I would like to convey my thanks to you for your help during my stay here in Nanjing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is our pleasure . It has been a great pleasure to work with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . I am looking forward to cooperating with you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Great ! We will . Well , what's your flight number ? When are you leaving tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's Flight No . 104 , Northey Airlines , which leaves at ten O'dock tomorrow evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will send someone to see you off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is so thoughtful of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My pleasure . Take care and have a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . My wife and I will be welcoming and looking forward to your visit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's call it a deal . Hope to see you again soon . Keep in touch then . Byebye .
segments.speaker: S1
